verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from the LORD <S%H3068><s%><S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%>

And <S%H559>say<s%> you to them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H8085>obeys<s%> not the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%>

<S%H834>Which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H3564>furnace,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them, according to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you: so shall you be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be your <S%H430>God:<s%>

That I may <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H7621>oath<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> them a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%> Then <S%H6030>answered<s%> I, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H543>So<s%> be it, O <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H7121>Proclaim<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

For I earnestly <S%H5749>protested<s%> to your <S%H1>fathers<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H5927>brought<s%> them up out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H7925>rising<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> and <S%H5749>protesting,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H8085>Obey<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>

Yet they <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> not, <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> their <S%H241>ear,<s%> but <S%H3212>walked<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of their <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> therefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> on them <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them to <S%H6213>do:<s%> but they <S%H6213>did<s%> them not.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, A <S%H7195>conspiracy<s%> is <S%H4672>found<s%> among the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and among the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

They are <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> to the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of their <S%H1>forefathers,<s%> <S%H7223><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H1697>words;<s%> and they <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them: the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6565>broken<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H3772>made<s%> with their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on them, <S%H834>which<s%> they shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3318>escape;<s%> and though they shall <S%H2199>cry<s%> to me, I will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to them.

Then shall the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry<s%> to the <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H1992><s%> they offer <S%H6999>incense:<s%> but they shall not <S%H3467>save<s%> them at all in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>

For according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H5892>cities<s%> were your <S%H430>gods,<s%> O <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> and according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> have you <S%H7760>set<s%> up <S%H4196>altars<s%> to that <S%H1322>shameful<s%> thing, even <S%H4196>altars<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>

Therefore <S%H6419>pray<s%> not you for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> <S%H5375>lift<s%> up a <S%H7440>cry<s%> or <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for them: for I will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> them in the <S%H6256>time<s%> that they <S%H7121>cry<s%> to me for their <S%H7451>trouble.<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> has my <S%H3039>beloved<s%> to do in my <S%H1004>house,<s%> seeing she has <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H4209>lewdness<s%> with <S%H7227>many,<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H5674>passed<s%> from you? <S%H3588>when<s%> you do <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> you <S%H5937>rejoice.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> your <S%H8034>name,<s%> A <S%H7488>green<s%> <S%H2132>olive<s%> tree, <S%H3303>fair,<s%> and of <S%H3303>goodly<s%> <S%H8389><s%> <S%H6529>fruit:<s%> with the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1999>tumult<s%> he has <S%H3341>kindled<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> on it, and the <S%H1808>branches<s%> of it are <S%H7489>broken.<s%>

For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that <S%H5193>planted<s%> you, has <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> you, for the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> against <S%H1992>themselves<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> in offering <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has given me <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> of it, and I <S%H3045>know<s%> it: <S%H227>then<s%> you <S%H7200>showed<s%> me their <S%H4611>doings.<s%>

But I was like a <S%H3532>lamb<s%> or an <S%H441>ox<s%> that is <S%H2986>brought<s%> to the <S%H2873>slaughter;<s%> and I <S%H3045>knew<s%> not that they had <S%H2803>devised<s%> <S%H4284>devices<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> me, saying, Let us <S%H7843>destroy<s%> the <S%H6086>tree<s%> with the <S%H3899>fruit<s%> thereof, and let us <S%H3772>cut<s%> him off from the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> that his <S%H8034>name<s%> may be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> <S%H2142>remembered.<s%>

But, O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> that <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H6664>righteously,<s%> that <S%H974>try<s%> the <S%H3629>reins<s%> and the <S%H3820>heart,<s%> let me <S%H7200>see<s%> your <S%H5360>vengeance<s%> on them: for to you have I <S%H1540>revealed<s%> my <S%H7379>cause.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H5315>life,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> not in the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that you <S%H4191>die<s%> not by our <S%H3027>hand:<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> them: the <S%H970>young<s%> men shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%> by <S%H7458>famine:<s%>

And there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of them: for I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> even the <S%H8141>year<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation.<s%>
